body.name: Travel Make up Mirror with Light and Removable 10X Magnification Mirror,8” Portable Vanity Mirror with Angle & Height Adjusting Stand,Rechargeable Makeup mirror with 3 Light Colors & Stepless Dimming

features: Portable folding makeup mirror: TPCHOIE travel makeup mirror, 8” round” x 0.75” high when closed. Features 3 light colors: warm/natural/cool light and stepless dimming & memory function. It comes with a waterproof bag for your daily storage.

Angle & height adjustable stand: Portable lighted beauty mirror with a 90°rotating bracket and mirror can rotate to 180°, max height 13.19”. Light will turn off automatically after 30mins.Bracket with hall switch,light on/off automatically when mirror face leave stand more/less than 30°.

Extra 10X magnifying mirror: Lighted travel makeup mirror package includes a small 10X magnifying mirror that can attach to any part of mirror face magnetically and can also be used as a pocket handheld mirror.

Rechargeable 1550mAh battery: The rechargeable makeup mirror for travel has built-in 1550mAh lithium battery & type C usb port for recharging & a 39” long USB cable.Charging time is 2hrs and will last 2.5 to 5hrs wireless usage.
What’s Included in box: 1pc 8” travel make up mirror & 1pc 10X magnifying mirror & 1pc 39” USB charging cable & 1pc waterproof storage bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect little travel mirror!
reviews.reviewText: Ok, so I don’t normally write reviews, but this little travel makeup mirror set is my new favorite thing! First of all, there are 2 mirrors (one small 10x magnified mirror and a larger regular magnification) that are both very high quality. VERY IMPORTANT In a mirror! Especially the little magnification mirror - it’s bad enough to see your face magnified at my age, but a bad quality mirror makes it way worse!Also, the large mirror has one continuous light all the way around instead of the individual led lights which gives a very natural even light. One of the best things is that the light setting is adjustable - it dims continuously as you hold the button and the high setting super bright! Plus the little 10x magnification mirror is magnetic and sticks anywhere on the front of the larger mirror which I have not seen in other mirrors. I even use it in the kitchen attached to my refrigerator!And the height adjustability is a key feature - the ability to change the height eliminates the need for precarious balancing acts with random items just to get the right angle. It's a small yet significant detail that makes a world of difference. The size is perfect for travel or home. I travel a lot, so its slim size makes it fit in my bag no matter how much I overpack. Lastly, it’s rechargeable with a usb input! I would recommend this product unconditionally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Travel Size. Lightweight and bright light.
reviews.reviewText: Traveled all through Europe with this mirror. Great size and has awesome LED light. Rechargeable is better than carrying batteries around. Adjustable height is good so no propping on the suitcase! I am very happy with this mirror, good for travel and for home. I will buy some for gifts too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and super bright steady ring of light. Best quality.
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several other travel makeup mirrors to find the best one for traveling. This one is far superior to the others, adjustable height and angle is very useful for traveling as it's just like the one I have at home which I can't travel with. Also love that it is rechargeable, no batteries to worry about. Adjustable LED brightness is a plus. Overall highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel mirror!
reviews.reviewText: Great travel mirror - sturdy, compact, and works well. Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great little travel mirror
reviews.reviewText: I was using my daughter's 'flipable' makeup mirror and got this one since I was moving. It is nice and compact, easy to store, set up and use. Because of the way the magnification is achieved (with a small magnetic mirrored square that you attach to the larger mirror), I find it takes me a bit to adjust my focus to just the magnified portion of the mirror.All in all, it works for what I wanted it for and I would recommend for travel and light use of the magnification piece. If your focus or primary use will be the magnification piece, I might look for another option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic travel mirror!
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is excellent! I ordered it to take on trips with me, since I am rarely happy with the bathroom lighting in hotels these days. I also always need a magnifying mirror with me for my brows and doing eye makeup now that I have the standard over 45 vision issues.I charged the mirror before packing it to go on a cruise. It's a full sized 8" face mirror but folds up very flat and doesn't take up much space. Fit neatly in the included storage bag along with the charging cable and smaller magnifying mirror.The fold out stand is very stable. The mirror angle is easy to adjust and stays in place. The led lights provide plenty of light and are brightness and color adjustable. The small magnifying mirror was great- magnets in it are strong and it stays put wherever you place it on the mirror (even in rough seas).I used this mirror daily- sometimes twice a day- for 10 days and never needed to recharge it. The battery life is good!I am really happy with this mirror and would definitely recommend it. It would make a great gift too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mirror can adjust to suit almost any height or angle needed. When I’m at home I’m usually sitting at my desk to put on my makeup but when I’m at my parents’ house it’s at a bathroom counter sitting on a stool and when I’m in our campervan it’s sitting in a tiny bathroom at a weird angle. Since the base of the unit is the same size as the mirror it adds amazing stability. The main bracket somewhat snaps to an upright position but then the mirror angles to accommodate different heights. The mirror can then rotate around to the other side and again can angle for various heights. Super functional.A magnification mirror is needed once you start aging and need the extra zoom in order to put on mascara and such. The additional 10x mirror being magnetized and then being able to stick right on the larger mirror is wonderful. Although the 10x doesn’t fit inside the larger mirror for storage the small size makes it easy to carry in a purse.Unfortunately the size is about an inch too big to include inside my travel makeup bag, which is only about 7 inches wide. The stability, angling options, slim design, magnetic 10x mirror and being re-chargeable are enough reasons though for me to still bring along when traveling and just pack it in-between my clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT travel (and everyday) mirror!
reviews.reviewText: - This mirror is so compact and lightweight, but at the same time, it feels incredibly sturdy.- It can be adjusted many different ways because of how the stand opens up.- The two folding joint parts are very strong. You can position the mirror at almost any angle and it will hold in place.- There are two touch buttons on the mirror— one for power and the other for light temperature. Both buttons are super responsive, even to a light tap.- This mirror fits perfect in my vanity drawer, so it quickly became my go-to makeup mirror. I previously had a different stand mirror, but it wasn't foldable. I was getting sick of leaving it out on the counter all the time.- I've only ever had small travel mirrors before, so I'm excited to take this one on a trip over the summer. It will easily slide into a suitcase pocket or a carry-on bag.- The included bag holds the mirror, the optional close-up mirror attachment, and the cord.- The only con is that the strings on the included bag are too silky so they don't stay tied. That's not too big of a deal for me, I'll probably use a different bag for it when I travel though.- The mirror itself is great 5/5 stars. Highly recommend.
